biography.bio: Artúr Somlay was born on February 28, 1883 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary as Schneider Artúr. He was an actor and writer, known for It Happened in Europe (1948), The New Landlord (1935) and Today and Tomorrow (1912). He died on November 11, 1951 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Artúr Somlay

biography.bio: Mária Egry was born on August 15, 1914 in Nagyenyed, Hungary. She was an actress, known for Egy bolond százat csinál (1942), The New Landlord (1935) and A színház szerelmese (1944). She was married to Emil Martonffi. She died on December 10, 1993 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Mária Egry

biography.birthName: Elisabeth Clotilde Hedvige Maria Gabriella Gruszner
biography.bio: Zita Gordon was born on December 2, 1911 in Gyöngyös, Hungary as Elisabeth Clotilde Hedvige Maria Gabriella Gruszner. She was an actress, known for The New Landlord (1935), The Little Pastry Shop (1935) and Évforduló (1936). She was married to Nigel Sutton and Lewis Gielgud. She died on February 9, 2006 in England.
biography.name: Zita Gordon

biography.bio: Gyula Csortos was born on March 3, 1883 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Hyppolit, the Butler (1931), Seven Plum Trees (1940) and Balaton Condemned (1933). He died on August 1, 1945 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Gyula Csortos

biography.bio: Pál Jávor was born on January 31, 1902 in Arad, Austria-Hungary as Pál Jermann. He was an actor, known for Boy, the Noszty (1938), Dankó Pista (1941) and Lángok (1941). He was married to Olga Landesmann. He died on August 14, 1959 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Pál Jávor

biography.bio: Kálmán Rózsahegyi was born on October 6, 1873 in Endrõd, Hungary. He was an actor, known for A cigány (1925), Légy jó mindhalálig (1936) and L'institutrice (1945). He was married to Angéla Hevesi. He died on August 27, 1961 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Kálmán Rózsahegyi

biography.bio: Mária Lázár was born on April 18, 1895 in Herkulesfürdõ, Hungary as Mária Czartorisky. She was an actress, known for Ember a híd alatt (1936), Three Spinsters (1936) and A férfi mind örült (1937). She was married to András Kiár, Antal Burger and Lajos Ihász. She died on October 1, 1983 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Mária Lázár

biography.placeOfBirth: Munkács, Hungary, Austria-Hungary [now Mukachevo, Zakarpattia Oblast, Ukraine]
biography.bio: Tivadar Uray was born on November 9, 1895 in Munkács, Hungary, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Young Noszty and Mary Toth (1960), Az aranyember (1936) and Semmelweis (1940). He was married to Erzsi Ághy. He died on June 22, 1962 in Mukachevo, Ukrainian SSR, USSR.
biography.name: Tivadar Uray

biography.bio: Piri Peéry was born on May 12, 1904 in Budapest, Hungary as Mersich Piroska. She was an actress and writer, known for Szent Péter esernyöje (1935), Merry-Go-Round (1956) and Egy csók és más semmi (1941). She was married to Antal Németh. She died on December 31, 1962 in Pécs, Hungary.
biography.name: Piri Peéry

biography.bio: Gerö Mály was born on August 1, 1884 in Székelyudvarhely, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Pista tekintetes úr (1943), Sári biró (1943) and Negyedíziglen (1942). He died in July 1952 in New York City, New York, USA.
biography.name: Gerö Mály

biography.bio: Zoltán Makláry was born on April 16, 1896 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary. He was an actor, known for Yesterday (1959), Föltámadott a tenger (1953) and Bogáncs (1959). He died on July 12, 1978 in Budapest, Hungary.
biography.name: Zoltán Makláry

biography.bio: He began as an amateur in the Thália Company. In 1906 he entered into engagement with the National Theatre where he played until his retirement. Beside being an actor he also designed as a scenist and directed. He played heroes, character roles and comic figures.
biography.name: György Kürthy

biography.bio: Gyula Justh was born on June 24, 1887 in Budapest, Hungary. He was an actor, known for Az aranyember (1936), The New Landlord (1935) and A férfi mind örült (1937). He died on June 3, 1955 in Budapest.
biography.name: Gyula Justh

biography.bio: Tivadar Bilicsi was born on September 6, 1901 in Budapest, Austria-Hungary as Grawatsch Tivadar. He was an actor, known for Behajtani tilos! (1941), Végre! (1941) and Barátságos arcot kérek (1936). He was married to Tímár Liza. He died on July 11, 1981 in Siófok, Hungary.
biography.name: Tivadar Bilicsi

biography.bio: Ede Hilbert was born on September 4, 1927 in Budapest, Hungary. He was an actor, known for The New Landlord (1935), Freedom Dance (2007) and Meseautó (1934). He was married to Judit Hibert. He died on August 22, 2006 in Baltimore, Maryland, USA.
biography.name: Ede Hilbert
